CustomField.description: NBA Rule Name within a Rule Set. Rule Name will be displayed on the record served up or opened. A new rule is added as inactive and the priority set to the last numbered priority.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: NBA Rule Name within a Rule Set. Rule Name will be displayed on the record served up or opened. A new rule is added as inactive and the priority set to the last numbered priority.
CustomField.label: Rule Name
